name: Vegetarian Lasagna
instructions: Layer lasagna noodles with tomato sauce, cheese, and sliced zucchini. Bake at 375°F for 45 minutes.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
instructions: Heat oil in a wok, stir-fry vegetables with soy sauce and garlic until tender-crisp. Serve with rice.

name: Spinach and Feta Quesadilla
instructions: Spread spinach and feta on one half of a tortilla. Fold it over and grill in olive oil until golden brown.

name: Sweet Potato Curry
instructions: Sauté onion and garlic, then add sweet potatoes, curry powder, and coconut milk. Simmer until sweet potatoes are tender.

name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Layer slices of tomato, mozzarella, and basil leaves. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

name: Chickpea Salad Sandwich
instructions: Mash chickpeas, mix with mayo, celery, and onion. Spread on bread and serve.

name: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: Sauté onion, then add beans, tomato, and chili powder. Simmer for 30 minutes.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
instructions: Bread and bake eggplant slices, then layer with tomato sauce and cheese. Bake again until bubbly.

name: Lentil Soup
instructions: Sauté vegetables, then add lentils and broth. Simmer until lentils are soft.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
instructions: Stuff bell peppers with a mixture of rice, beans, and cheese. Top with tomato sauce and bake.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Cook onion and mushrooms, then stir in rice. Gradually add broth, stirring until creamy. Top with parmesan.

name: Vegetable Tacos
instructions: Fill tortillas with beans, avocado, lettuce, and salsa. Serve immediately.

name: Cauliflower Buffalo Wings
instructions: Coat cauliflower florets in a batter, then breadcrumbs. Bake and toss with melted butter and hot sauce.

name: Vegetarian Sushi
instructions: Spread rice on nori, layer with vegetables, and roll tightly. Slice and serve with soy sauce.

name: Vegetable Pad Thai
instructions: Cook noodles, then stir-fry with tofu, carrot, and pad thai sauce. Top with peanuts.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
instructions: Top pizza dough with sauce, cheese, and vegetables. Bake at 400°F for 15 minutes.

name: Roasted Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Roast vegetables, then mix with cooked quinoa. Drizzle with olive oil and serve.

name: Pumpkin Soup
instructions: Cook pumpkin with onion and broth, then blend until smooth. Stir in coconut milk and curry powder.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Spread mashed avocado on toasted bread. Drizzle with lemon juice and sprinkle with red pepper flakes.
